column1: The ship wasn't designed to operate for centuries. Air filtration systems are breaking down and need repair otherwise people will suffer from poor air quality
column7: The poor air quality starves the crew of oxygen in their sleep. -1 intelligence to all.
column8: The air filters are fixed -- for now anyway

column1: The crew split into two rival factions which war for resources.
column7: The rivalry boils over into a fight and a crew member is killed!
column8: The rival factions make peace and learn a lesson about understanding. +1 Empathy

column1: Frayed wires lead to short circuits which lead to small fires. Repairs are in order
column7: A small fire suffocates a crew member!
column8: Electrical tape makes short work of the problem.

column1: A hardware fault causes most of the ship's digital artwork to be corrupted. Clever programming and artistic restoration are needed to restore the cultural heritage of the crew.
column7: Living without access to the artistic heritage of their ancestors is deeply depressing and stunts creative growth. -1 Creativity
column8: The historical digital art has been restored thanks to the efforts of the ship's artists and software engineers

column1: Renovations have exposed an ancient mural painted hundreds of years ago. Restoring it might take some time.
column7: People remain curious as to what the mural shows.
column8: The mural has been restored showing how life was in the distant past. +1 Creativity

column1: Renovations have released an ancient illness which is devastating the crew. A cure is needed and fast.
column2: Race for the Cure - emp & int
column7: With no cure in sight one of the crew is killed by the unknown pathogen.
column8: Doctors have sythesized a vaccine for this plague and are treating the remaining affected crew

column1: The biological waste converter finally broke down. Until it is fixed considerable amounts of power will be spent refrigerating the waste for obvious reasons.
column2: When Stuff hits the Fan - int.
column7: Refrigeration on the biowaste remains in effect until the converter is repaired. -50 Fuel.
column8: The converter is operating normally again and the massive fuel drain is suspended.
